articles.author: Anirudh Singh
articles.title: Glenn Maxwell's wife Vini reacts to her husband's scintillating ton against India – IND vs AUS, 3rd T20I - Cricket Times
articles.description: Vini Raman reacted to Glenn Maxwell's fast and furious knock against India. Maxwell took Australia over the finish line on the last ball of the match.
articles.content: In the electrifying clash between India and Australia during the 3rd T20 International at Guwahati’s Barsapara Cricket Stadium, Glenn Maxwell’s breathtaking century became the talk of the cricketing … [+1832 chars]
